title: Why MVC is so important
text: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the VIEW layer for design, and the Controller laye for applicatioin logic.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
text: I have really learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!

title: MVC vs MVVM - Difference Between Them
text: MVC framework is an architectural pattern that separates an application into three main logical components Model, View, and Controller.
text1: MVC framework is an architectural pattern that separates an application into three main logical components Model, View, and Controller. On the other hand, MVVM facilitates a separation of development of the graphical user interface with the help of mark-up language or GUI code.

title: SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL
text: PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite use very similar syntax, with some notable differences highlighted below. Microsoft SQL Server has the greatest contrast in SQL syntax, as well as a wide variety of functions not available in other platforms.

title: What is Handlebars?
text: Handlebars is a simple templating language. It uses a template and an input object to generate HTML or other text formats. Handlebars templates look like regular text with embedded Handlebars expressions.
